content: Yes, "The Power of Now: A Guide to Spiritual Enlightenment" by Eckhart Tolle is a great personal growth book with actionable steps to help someone overcome fear and anxiety. The book guides the reader to focus on the present moment and become more self-aware. By doing so, one learns to detach from negative thoughts and emotions, which cause fear and anxiety. The book also provides practical exercises and techniques to help readers stay present and develop a more peaceful and fulfilling life.
